name: Lily's Little Mystery
description:
✱ STORY

Two Ghost sisters living together... Today, the eldest wants to play! She has hidden her beloved sisters last slice of Strawberry Shortcake.

✱ INFO

Incredibly short test-game made in about 2 days... I had a surge of motivation and wanted to create something before it was lost. There is only one ending and the game itself is linear.

All art and OCs are mine! 

➤ Music from MusMus
